lines.text: We women can do things to a man we love that men wouldn't do to a rattlesnake.
Why, honey, you look sharp as a razor.
Oh, there he is, the sweetheart!

[Rhetorically]
How do yuh think I'm gonna run a stallion farm without a stud?

[to Duke]
Say, we got more dead horses on this place than live ones!

[to Maizie about her use of his cold cream]
From now on, Madam, your face is in your own hands!
You'll never know what my face looked like before your preparation.

[Taking offense]
Caretaker, you infernal jackass! My grandfather built this dump!

[Talking about Jesse]
Fritzi, you give him a kiss or I will!
